landing_page.h2: Helping bars’ owners boost their revenue by letting the customers order and pay without the need of a waiter.
landing_page.box_1_title: Reduce the time per customer per table
landing_page.box_1_content: Your customers will consume faster reducing the waiting time for serving, ordering and billing. You will have more customers per day.
landing_page.box_2_content: You customers won’t need to wait for the waiter to order and deliver the drinks. This will result in more spending per customer.
landing_page.box_3_title: Let the world know where you are
landing_page.box_3_content: Potential customers will know when you are open, what type of music you have and will be able to make online reservations.
